page.title: 02LLANGURIG POWYS:ARMED FORCES
page.content: There are{no armed-forces bases}in the Llangurig area. However, two local men belong to the{Royal Navy - Neil {Richards}and{Adrian Emmanuel.}Neil is an able-seaman studying weaponry on {H.M.S. Exeter.}He has just sailed to the{Persian Gulf}on surveillance duty. Adrain is a chief petty officer serving on{H.M.S. Ajax.}He saw action in the{Falklands campaign. This area is subject to low-flying aircraft belonging to the{R.A.F.}and the{U.S.A.F. Farmers in the area are often annoyed when these planes{frighten}their {livestock. To{compensate}for the disturbance the{Red Arrows}display team perform aerobatic displays every other year in {Llanidloes.
